returns._policyBooks: is array of registered PolicyBook addresses
returns._policyBooksCount: is count of returned registered PolicyBook addresses

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._contract: is contract address to lookup for created IPolicyBook

returns._policyBook: is policy book address if exists for passed contract address, if not it will return address(0)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._annualProfitYields: is array of annual profit yields per PolicyBooks
returns._maxCapacities: is array of max capacities per PolicyBooks
returns._totalDaiLiquidity: is array of DAI liquidity per PolicyBooks
returns._yearlyCost: is array of yearly costs per PolicyBooks

params._insuredContracts: is list of insuredContracts in registry

returns._annualProfitYields: is array of annual profit yields per PolicyBooks
returns._maxCapacities: is array of max capacities per PolicyBooks
returns._totalDaiLiquidity: is array of DAI liquidity per PolicyBooks
returns._yearlyCost: is array of yearly costs per PolicyBooks

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
